thread.section_title: Easy Comforts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Comforts | www.easycomforts.com
thread.title: Janice Parker
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by Janice Parker

author: Janice Parker
title: Janice Parker
text: Viewed the site for the first time, was impressed with the items for sale that makes the life of someone who is elderly or disabled more comfortable. I'm diabetic and tried the sugar free candy fruit slices! I thought I was having "real" candy! Satisfied my sweet tooth. I will order candy each month until I have tried all of them and will continue to order my favoriates. The side toenail clipper was just like the hospital's and it was a life savor! No more doctor payments to get my toe nails clipped!
